title: Hypocritical Ban
body: Hey guys I have been permanently banned from playing league of legends for telling someone to not say "kys" yet riot says that they will not be lifting the ban because i used "kys", although when someone on our team said "kys" i used the phrase by saying "if u say kys u will get banned" although i was banned. How ironic. I have contacted riot many times and they will not lift it and say they are going to close my ticket. Do you guys think I should be banned for telling someone to not say kys?

replies.body: i saw the chat log below, and tbh it more looks like a chat restriction/14 day ban than a perma ban, the bot is kinda out of control

God its so low iq that Riot never gives the chat logs of anyone else in these cases. If I got reported I'd want to know what I responded to or when ppl post here and can only give their side. Heck if Riot is afraid of name and shame just make other summoners appear as their champions names or names like Summoner 1, Summoner 2, etc.

Also the chat is ran by a bot these days so if you say one of the nono words kys, [slur for race], [slur for gays] and many more then the bot just gives you instant 14 day or if you had a 14 day before instant perma.

Riot support of course sticks by this when imo context really should matter. No, Riot doesn't care, if you say any of those words and get reported no matter what no ban overturn.

Going to need more info bro. If it was one game that you only said, "saying kys will get you banned" then no. Key word ONLY. If there was nothing else said to get triggered by the report system then no, You shouldn't be punished for it. Even if there was slightly bad behavior during that game I don't think it should punishable by a perm ban.

As I had put in my thread they can take a lot of things out of context and use it against you to say "you're punishment is justified, you said this and that". So.. You're going need to elaborate more on the circumstances.

I'd also like to tell you that they are going to say you've had lots of reports on this account and that the penalties that get issues for permanent bans are manual reviews (not done by bots). Though, I can't confirm the legitimacy of this. I've heard a lot of stories on people being permed for ridiculous reasons and as you said so yourself, riot close tickets. Personally I don't think they care, especially in OCE. If they had just had tribunal when they moved servers 4 seasons ago. No one would have complained about toxicity and no would be complaining about unfair judgement by their BOT. It would be community reviews not riot and not riots bot. It's biased.

>no would be complaining about unfair judgement by their BOT

The players decide what to report. If you are not reported, the game is not reviewed.

The thing is Seras, I don't remember playing that game before and getting suspended for 2 weeks, I took about a 6 month break from league when i got suspended, and I leave my password and username on my desk so someone easily could've used my account. Very stupid of me but I didn't get myself banned the first time.
